    Awards and achievements

    College Level:

    • Ranked in top 5% of the students in the Information Technology department.
    • Qualified for Google Code Jam 2014 Online Round 1.
    • Winner: Code It 2014 at Bhartiya Vidhyapeeth.
    • Runner-Up: Xterminate 2014 at COEP.
    • 3rd Prize: Debugging 2015 AIT.



    School Level:

    • First Prize in the Talent Search Competition (Music Category) for playing the Guitar
    • Second Prize in the Talent Search Competition (Music Category) for playing the Guitar
    • Was a part of the Softball Team that won the Annual Inter School Tournament and led the team at State Level.


    Extracurricular Achievements:

    • Member of the Programming Team within PICT IEEE Student Branch, Asia's most active IEEE Student's Branch.
    • Organized Credenz’15 (October 2015), PICT's biggest technical event.
    • Organised a programming event named CLASH and managed a team of 12 juniors along with 3 other members
    • Volunteered Credenz’14 (October 2014) to advertise the overall event in other colleges.
    • Organized / Volunteered, Credenz Tech Days (February 2014)
    • Conducted Special Interest Group Seminars on C and Data Structures specifically for the first-year students.
